title: Designing Work-Integrated Mathematics Courses Using Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Digital device (tablet/laptop) provision environment with established institutional technical support systems, emphasizing practical application cases

learning_goals: Learners can self-directedly complete 10 hours of weekly online content (videos, quizzes) in a blended learning environment
Learners can complete at least 80% of practical problem-solving projects based on online learning content in offline classes
Learners can perform and exchange feedback on collaborative activities with peers at least twice weekly using a blended learning platform (LMS)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
